```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Time Analysis


```{r}
maryland_time <- read_csv("~/code/umdwbb-data/maryland_time.csv", 
     col_types = cols(date = col_date(format = "%m/%d/%Y"), 
         home_lead_time = col_time(format = "%M:%S"), 
         home_pct_lead = col_number(), visitor_lead_time = col_time(format = "%M:%S"), 
         visitor_pct_lead = col_number()))
```

```{r}
largest_visitor_leads <- maryland_time %>%
   filter(home == 'Maryland') %>%
   arrange(desc(visitor_largest_lead))
```

```{r}
largest_home_leads <- maryland_time %>%
   filter(visitor == 'Maryland') %>%
   arrange(desc(home_largest_lead))

```


## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
